It's too bad that a game that allows you to play both as a stealth experience or a action game doesn't manage to do either of them very well.
Yet another middle of the road film license that survives by dint of being as average as they come.
In the end, Live 07 reminds me of Shaq at the charity stripe: It throws up way too many bricks. [Dec. 2006, p.126]
Hats off to Cavia for twisting the concept of a third-person shooter and making a game that is enjoyable in spite of its flaws.
